scripts.deploy-sign-in: gcloud functions deploy beforeSignIn --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region=europe-central2 --set-env-vars ADMIN_EMAILS='miso.moravik4@gmail.com'
scripts.deploy-create: gcloud functions deploy beforeCreate --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region=europe-central2 --set-env-vars ADMIN_EMAILS='miso.moravik4@gmail.com'
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy-sign-in && npm run deploy-create
